alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 11:20AM CST until March 08 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Missouri... Bourbeuse River at Union. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Valley Park. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, The south riverward side of Marshall Road begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 18.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM CST Monday was 18.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Meramec River Valley Park 18.0 18.9 17.6 10.7 4.4 3.5 2.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
